column1: Table 13:  Number of sentenced prisoners under State or Federal jurisdiction, by gender, race, Hispanic origin, and age, 2002
Authors:  Paige Harrison and Allen Beck
Table 13.  Number of sentenced prisoners under State or Federal jurisdiction, by gender, race, Hispanic origin, and age, 2002

Note:  Based on custody counts from National Prisoner Statistics (NPS-1A) and updated from jurisdiction counts by gender at yearend. Estimates by age dervied from the Survey of Inmates in State and Correctional Facilities, 1997. Estimates
a/Includes American Indians, Alaska Natives, Asians, Native Hawaiians, and other Pacific Islanders.
